jobTitle: Data Analyst - Undergraduate Student Financial Services
jobDescription: APU is seeking employees who desire to engage in our thriving culture by cultivating community through professional interactions, demonstrating a posture of lifelong learning, and modeling Christ-like character. Working together, employees at APU commit to establishing a university atmosphere that is pleasing to God and edifying to one another.  The person in this position is responsible for the configuration and day-to-day management of the Financial Aid module within the PeopleSoft data system. This data expert understands the configuration, regular use, and data of the PeopleSoft module and interfaces between business, data, and technical resources. The Data Analyst writes departmental queries, letters, and reports as appropriate with the escalated assistance of EDM or Associate Director. In addition, this position sets standards for use of software in the unit and serves as the liaison between the department and the EDM Enterprise Applications Engineer when technical issues need escalation. This position is tier one technical and systems support for Undergraduate Financial Aid, and troubleshoots, researches, and proposes solutions for any systems issues that are reported before escalating to the EDM Enterprise Applications Engineer if necessary. It will also require working alongside the project manager or providing project management for new initiatives and projects.
